content: + 1-year subscription for functionality and security updates.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe a 1-year subscription benefit, indicating that it includes functionality and security updates. It appears in UI elements related to purchasing or upgrading to a professional version of an application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Updates von Funktionalit√§t und Sicherheit innerhalb vom 1-j√§hrigen Abonnement' doesn't accurately convey the original meaning. It's a bit wordy and doesn't directly state '1-year subscription'.  The original emphasizes a subscription *for* updates.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + 1 Jahr Abonnement f√ºr Funktions- und Sicherheitsupdates.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'von' which sounds less natural in this context. It could be slightly improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + 1 Jahr Abonnement f√ºr Funktions- und Sicherheitsupdates.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The plus sign (+) at the beginning of the Armenian translation is missing, mirroring the English content.
The '+' sign is placed awkwardly before the '1-year subscription'. It should be integrated more naturally into the sentence.
While technically correct, '+ 1 year' sounds a bit unnatural in Japanese and may be better represented as a more fluent phrasing.

The English phrase "for functionality and security updates" is not perfectly captured by "Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú". While understandable, a more direct translation would improve clarity. "Í∏∞Îä• Î∞è Î≥¥Ïïà ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏Î•º ÏúÑÌïú" or "Í∏∞Îä• Î∞è Î≥¥Ïïà ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏ Ï†úÍ≥µÏóê ÎåÄÌïú" would be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + Í∏∞Îä• Î∞è Î≥¥Ïïà ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏Î•º ÏúÑÌïú 1ÎÖÑ Íµ¨ÎèÖ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term '‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡∫≠‡∫±‡∫ö‡ªÄ‡∫î‡∫î' (kaan ap det) could be more accurately translated as '‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡∫õ‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫õ‡∫∏‡∫á' (kaan bap bpung) which means 'improvements' or 'updates'. While '‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡∫≠‡∫±‡∫ö‡ªÄ‡∫î‡∫î' is understandable, '‡∫Å‡∫≤‡∫ô‡∫õ‡∫±‡∫ö‡∫õ‡∫∏‡∫á' is more natural in this context.

The English content uses the term "functionality" which is not directly conveyed by the Polish translation. While 'funkcji' can mean function, it lacks the nuance of capabilities or features. It's also slightly less natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Roczna subskrypcja umo≈ºliwiajƒÖca dostƒôp do aktualizacji zabezpiecze≈Ñ i funkcji.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'functionality and security updates' is not perfectly captured by '√ÆmbunƒÉtƒÉ»õirea func»õionalitƒÉ»õii »ôi securitƒÉ»õii'. While not incorrect, 'actualizƒÉri de func»õionalitate »ôi securitate' would be a more direct and natural translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abonament de 1 an cu actualizƒÉri de func»õionalitate »ôi securitate

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase '1-year subscription' is not accurately reflected in the Russian translation. '–≤ —Ç–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ 1 –≥–æ–¥–∞' literally translates to 'within 1 year' which implies a period, not a subscription. A more appropriate translation would convey the idea of a subscription or entitlement.
The Sinhala translation includes a Sinhala numeral (ëá°) which is not consistent with the English content (+ 1-year).

The word ' ‡∂ö‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑ä‚Äç‡∑Ä‡∂∫ ' (kriyaakaarithvaya) can be translated as 'functionality'. However, a more natural translation for 'functionality and security updates' could be '‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‚Äç‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∑É‡∑Ñ ‡∂Ü‡∂ª‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∑Ç‡∑í‡∂≠ ‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂Ω' (kaaryanvitaa saha arakshithaya yaavathakaala).

The translation "+ ƒêƒÉng k√Ω 1 nƒÉm ƒë·ªÉ c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t ch·ª©c nƒÉng v√† b·∫£o m·∫≠t" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "+ 1-year subscription for functionality and security updates." "ƒêƒÉng k√Ω" implies simply registering, not necessarily obtaining a subscription with associated rights and benefits. It also misses the nuance of 'for' which implies what is being subscribed *to*.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + ƒêƒÉng k√Ω 1 nƒÉm ƒë·ªÉ nh·∫≠n c√°c b·∫£n c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t ch·ª©c nƒÉng v√† b·∫£o m·∫≠t.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The '+' sign at the beginning of the translation isn't directly addressed.  It's important to maintain consistency with the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: + ƒêƒÉng k√Ω 1 nƒÉm ƒë·ªÉ nh·∫≠n c√°c b·∫£n c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t ch·ª©c nƒÉng v√† b·∫£o m·∫≠t.
